A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I created this account for the sole reason of delivering a warning to anyone that's a star wars fan in my demographic\, i.e. not a 5 year old child or mentally handicapped.  They completely blew it. This movie was a mess and I should have walked out when Leia force flew herself out of space after surviving an unsurvivable explosion.  How could Disney release such a travesty of a film?  I would have rather watched two hours of Rey and Luke talking and walking around the island than this JarJar disaster.
